content: single_crochet 3 sts together single_crochet 7 single_crochet 3 sts together single_crochet 1 16 fasten o� but don t sew in end fun fact the renal artery is slightly larger than the renal vein renal artery in hot red chain 6 sl join rounds 1-9 single_crochet around 6 fasten o� & sew in ends renal vein in blue chain 5 sl join rounds 1-9 single_crochet around 5 fasten o� & sew in ends ureter in aran chain 7 sl join rounds 1-18 single_crochet around 7 fasten o� & sew in ends assembly sew the renal artery renal vein and ureter in the same order as shown above place artery/vein/ureter complex inside the middle opening use the spare yarn end from the kidney to weave through the rim of the middle once you have weaved all the way around tighten and secure with a knot ☺ ta-da you now have your very own life-size kidney i hope you enjoyed this pattern if you have any questions feel free to reach out to me on my instagram @leapdoublecrochet or on my ravelry @leapdoublecrochet
